programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep153
programme.desc: Smile Day - When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep154
programme.desc: No Panic ! - Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Blue's Big Dance Party - Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. As we groove to find clues, we learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos - Sir Steel gets Professor Scratch to create an anti-gravity ray, which goes wrong in the hands of Ricardo! // Muffin's super bouncy ball threatens to wreck the annual Winter Festival! Kai learns to sacrifice something he loves for the greater good!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Lola's Air Display / Down The Sewers - Lola is worried her air display will not be impressive enough, but when Sir Steel joins, the air display goes wrong in a spectacular way! // When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway - On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Pups Save Walinda / Pups Save a Big Bone - The PAW Patrol plan a special celebration for Wally the Walrus. When he doesn't show up, they find he has a special new friend named Walinda! // During Capn Turbot's archaeological dig, a rock slide unearths a big dinosaur bone!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Pups Save a Floundering Francois / Pups Save the Pop-Up Penguins - Capn Turbot and his cousin Francois are whale watching when the Flounder hits a rock and starts to sink! This rescue needs all paws on deck. // Stowaway penguins have scattered around Adventure Bay! Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Honey Bear - When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam. // When Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other, he concocts an elaborate plan to bring them back together.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend - The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.// While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Sidekick Switcheroo - During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep241
programme.desc: Pen Pal - Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep701
programme.desc: Sparkle's Big Rescue - When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep420
programme.desc: The Midnight Mile - It may be nighttime in Axle City, but all the trucks are staying up super late for the ultimate all-night race: the Midnight Mile! And the first truck to cross the finish line will win the Glow-in-the-Dark trophy!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep824
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies - Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Cap'n Turbot and turns the town upside-down in the process. // Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep826
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater / Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile - The Pups rescue Francois from a water tower geyser. // The Pups rescue a baby anteater stuck on a bucking RoboHorse. // The Pups rescue Ace and her special delivery for Chickaletta's party. // The Pups rescue Mr. Porter and his stranded Food Truck.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Vigo's Surprise - Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice - Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Sheep Doggy! - When Farmer Joe's cute baby lamb wanders off the farm during a popcorn storm, Bubble Puppy becomes a sheepdog to save the day!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Blue's Big Imagination - Imagine along with Josh and Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue envisions a mysterious shape to be. We listen to a story created by Slippery, Magenta and Tickety and help Mr. Salt discover his own imagination!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Blue's Big Costume Parade - Everyone's dressed up in silly costumes for our BIG costume parade, but we don't know what costume Blue wants to wear! As we play Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Shovel make a truck-tastic costume and skidoo into Jill's puppet theater play!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Giddy-Up Games / The Golden Guitar - The crew agree to play a series of cowboy-themed games against the villainous Barbarito in an attempt to win a treasure. // Toms breaks his guitar while trying to retrieve the golden guitar of his idol and learns that music comes from within.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Turtle's Shell Day - Bossy plans a Shell Day party for Turtle without considering what Turtle wants.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Show and Smell - Bossy and Turtle bring fun and weird smelling food for "Show and Smell".

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Don't Look Now - During a sleepover Bossy and Turtle watch a scary movie but may have bitten off more than they can chew.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups Save A Royal Painting - Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep161
programme.desc: Backwards Day - Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. How will they ever manage to throw a great party for Ron?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep162
programme.desc: Stuck - Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, it's an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery - It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Knights of the Snack Table - Sir Joshalot and the Knights of the Snack Table are on an epic quest through the neighborhood to find a special treat for the afternoon snack feast! Throughout their journey, the knights demonstrate the most knightly of qualities-helping others.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art / Pups Save a Hot Potato - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Raining teddies / Party people - Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Small Is Smashing / Pine Cone Power Up - Sir Steel wants to shrink the trees in the Central Forest to make way for his new tower. Deer Squad have to think small to stop him! // Lola and her souped-up Rocket Rabbit wake the residents of the Central Forest with all the engine's roars.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler - Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time? // Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition / Pups Save a Chicken of the Sea - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow. // When the PAW Patrol sets out to retrieve Cap'n Turbot's sunken diving bell, they meet a giant Sea Slug!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pizza / Pups Save Skye - Alex and Mr. Porter are delivering pizza dough for a big party when the van spins out of control. Pups to the rescue! // Skye is on her way to Jake's Mountain when she crash lands in the snow. Ryder calls Everest to save the day!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Science Pair - Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Cart-tastrophe - Bossy schemes to get Turtle new Boom Boom Super Satang cards.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Center of a Tension - Bossy and Turtle have their first sleepover ever.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Pirate Party / Dr. Abuela - When Pepito magically gifts Escarlata legs, she finally gets the chance to crash her first Larimar party! // When Barbarito steals Doctora Abuela's ship and traps Santi and his crew, Tina and Abuela must save the day.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Treasure in the Sky - After finding a cosmic treasure map, Santiago and crew take to the stars to track the treasure down.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep251
programme.desc: Sleepover - Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zo Zebras house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Paramedic Power - When Blaze's friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep704
programme.desc: Knights in Sparkling Armor - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep917
programme.desc: Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger - When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Rockin' Out - Goby and Gil go on a quest to get a geode at the top of a volcano! Will they make it back to the Rocky Valley Rock Show in time to enter the contest for best rock?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Blue's Anywhere Box Surprise - Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Blue's Wish Comes True! - Blue finds a fairy wand that can grant everyone their biggest wish-all we need is the magic word! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the magic word, we go on a magical chase through the Wishing Woods and meet the Dandelion Fairy!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Nacho Supreme / Sea Cow - Toms's new pet friend, Nacho, shows off his special skills when the crew goes on a daring rescue mission to save Kiko. // The crew must stop Bonnie Bones' latest quest for treasure when she disrupts a manatee habitat with a sticky invention.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Happy Bestie-versary - Bossy and Turtle decide to exchange gifts for their first annual friendship anniversary.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Missing Falcon - Bossy and Turtle go full gumshoe to find Bissy's missing plushy.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark - The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor / Pups Save a Magic Trick - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Get Well Soon Badge - Oh dear, poor Norrie is sick. Can the squirrels think of something to cheer her up?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep21
programme.desc: The Hiccup Badge - The Squirrels meet a little worm who has swallowed a bit too much earth and has got the hiccups.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep22
programme.desc: The Maze Badge - Duggee's workshop needs cleaning, so the squirrels try to help him - but they end up building a maze around Duggee!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Hurricane Rescue - Grandmaster Glitch tries to rescue a Grimbot from an Atlantic hurricane. The Go Jetters have to rescue him!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Valley Of The Balls, Kazakhstan - Can the Go Jetters take control of a rocky situation in the Valley of Balls?

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep1
programme.desc: High and Low - Kit and Pup are at the swimming pool. Can you see who is the highest on the diving board and who is the lowest?

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep19
programme.desc: Fox - Dee encourages a friend to say 'fox' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today, we see a red fox, a furry fox, a fast fox and a fantastic fox.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Stairs - A musical staircase magically appears in Teletubbyland. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po take turns making music as they go up and down the stairs.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ready Steady Go! - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and do some exercise.

programme.title: Clangers S2 Ep12
programme.desc: The Mysterious Noise Machine - A strange object falls into the Iron Chicken's nest. No one knows what it is, until Major Clangers finds something in his workshop that seems to be a part of the same thing.

programme.desc: The Thing That Was Almost Tony - Gwen, Bob and Tony learn a new lesson about the importance of their special friendship.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep39
programme.desc: Egg Hill Farm - The folk at Egg Hill Farm are overrun... how can they house the chickens without leaving their home?

programme.desc: Three Cheers for Logi-Po - When Logi-Po passes an important test, the team organise a po-fect celebration.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep43

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep44
programme.desc: The Good Winner - Jeanie gets mad when she doesn't win a game, leaving Monty wondering whether you can turn a sore loser into a good loser.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Big and Small - Monty is struggling to make a huge gift for Jimmy Jones and starts to wonder if the best things might come in small packages.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep13
programme.desc: It's Time For a Boat Ride - JoJo and Gran Gran bump into Ned and Monty as they walk along the canal. Ned invites them onboard to go on a boat ride, where JoJo gets to act as captain - on the lookout for treasure!

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Farmer Christmas - Nelly and Nora see a man with a white beard and a red coat. Could it be...

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Hat Fuss - Scarf Lady needs some fresh inspiration and Sarah decides that the Hat Museum is the perfect place to visit.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Dewy Morning - Sarah and Duck are so keen to visit the art shop, they get there too early and have to find things to keep themselves entertained.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S15 Ep3
programme.desc: Emily and Dash - Emily is given the job of looking after Dash on a trip to the steam fair. Dash shows Emily how to make special noises with his whistle, but he does it so often, he runs out of fuel and gets stuck.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S15 Ep4
programme.desc: Percy's New Friends - Percy wants to make friends with the animals on Sodor, but they are frightened of him and run away. Percy realises that if he is gentle and quiet rather than fast and loud, he will stop scaring them.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Road Trip - Mum helps Bluey and Bingo find ways to entertain themselves on a family road trip, while Dad tries to stay ahead of the grey nomad convoy or risk camping near the toilets.

programme.desc: The Raindance Badge - When Duggee's flowers look very sad, everyone does a rain dance to help make it rain.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep25
programme.desc: The Balloon Badge - Duggee blows up some balloons for Tino the artistic mouse's birthday, but the squirrels are worried because Tino can be grumpy.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 22 - North Melbourne v Essendon Ep126
programme.desc: Essendon scored a one point win over bottom of the ladder West Coast, the Bombers' first win after three straight losses. Can Essendon remain in the finals hunt or will Alastair Clarkson guide North Melbourne to an upset win?

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 22 - Brisbane Lions v Adelaide Crows Ep127
programme.desc: Adelaide travel into the Lions' den to face Brisbane. The Lions have a solid record at home and sit 3rd on the ladder - equal on points with 2nd and 4th. The Crows are in 11th but only one win outside the Top 8.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 22 - Carlton v Melbourne Ep128
programme.desc: Carlton have won seven in a row to roar into finals contention. The Blues sit 5th on the ladder, 10 points behind the 2nd placed Melbourne. The Demons have won five straight and are playing for the doublechance in the finals.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Australians - Parrot Paradise Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Parrots are by far some of the world's most intelligent birds. Aaron Pedersen explores why these intelligent birds thrive in Australia, and what kind of impact their exceptional intellect has on our environment.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Bollywood: The Politics Behind The Scenes Ep15
programme.desc: In India the Modi Government is being accused of waging a war on Bollywood, the county's most powerful cultural force. Film makers who criticise the government or resist pressure to produce pro-Hindu content face a backlash.

programme.title: Four Corners - Shadow State Ep28
programme.desc: How consultants infiltrated government. Firms push ethical boundaries and cost billions of dollars with little transparency and almost no accountability. We reveal accusations of wasted public money and conflicts of interest.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep27
programme.desc: Onya Sonia ABC and Woodside Football fever.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep64
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Paramedics Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Nat and Leonard battle to save an elderly woman after a suspected stroke. Taz and Amanda race to help a child trapped in a car outside a kindergarten. A missing item of clothing has Nicola and Michelle scratching their heads.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep27
programme.desc: Join Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar, Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne for some of the best conversations as we hear from some of the most informed and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast.

programme.title: Landline Ep26
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep28
programme.desc: With a slowing economy, high inflation, a cost-of-living crisis, interest rate rises and global economic headwinds, it's never been more important to keep an eye on your finances. The week in business with Rachel Pupazzoni.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep28
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep30
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents a weekly roundup of stories filed by the ABC's international correspondents posted across the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India, Indonesia and more.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep30
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Tiana Penitani, Sam Wykes and Sera Naiqama are joined by dual international NRLW Eels star Shontelle Stowers. Plus the journey to representing Fiji and debuting for the NRL's Sydney Roosters for Siua Wong.

programme.title: Belonging(s) - Food: From Cookshops To Cuisine Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - We check the shards from rice bowls dated back to the 1870s when Chinese cookshops dotted the goldfields, and trace how early Chinese restaurants helped create the richness of contemporary Asian Australian cuisine.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Professor David Lloyd - Universities Australia Chair Ep28
programme.desc: Professor David Lloyd, Universities Australia Chair addresses the National Press Club.

programme.title: Landline Ep26
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep28
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast: Early Ep33
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Kathryn Robinson and James Glenday, plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep33
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus finance with David Chau and sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders Ep27
programme.desc: As Australians wrestle with important issues around the cost of living, housing, climate change, the Indigenous Voice, and many others, David Speers and the panel examine how the policies and politics impact people's lives.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep31
programme.desc: The Matildas are into the Final 8 and a World Cup Quarter Final after beating Denmark 2-0. Sam Kerr returns from injury. The Diamonds win the Netball World Cup. Plus the AFL, NRL and NRLW action heats up as the finals near.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep30
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Tiana Penitani, Sam Wykes and Sera Naiqama are joined by dual international NRLW Eels star Shontelle Stowers. Plus the journey to representing Fiji and debuting for the NRL's Sydney Roosters for Siua Wong.

programme.title: Ticket To The Cup - Sarai Bareman - Interview Ep10
programme.desc: Ahead of the FIFA Women's World Cup in Australia and New Zealand, Tracey Holmes spoke with FIFA Chief of Women's Football Sarai Bareman.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep8
programme.desc: The Pacific region is rich with culture, people and stories. Johnson Raela and Alice Lolohea bring you the stories that matter to the Pacific and the most up-to-date information, from journalists with deep regional expertise.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep65
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Bollywood: The Politics Behind The Scenes Ep15
programme.desc: In India the Modi Government is being accused of waging a war on Bollywood, the county's most powerful cultural force. Film makers who criticise the government or resist pressure to produce pro-Hindu content face a backlash.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 22 - Hawthorn v Western Bulldogs Ep129
programme.desc: Hawthorn upset league leaders Collingwood by 32, can they do the same to the Western Bulldogs? The Bulldogs sit 6th with 11 wins but on a congested ladder there are 8 teams vying for positions 5-8 and a spot in the finals.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep31
programme.desc: The Matildas are into the Final 8 and a World Cup Quarter Final after beating Denmark 2-0. Sam Kerr returns from injury. The Diamonds win the Netball World Cup. Plus the AFL, NRL and NRLW action heats up as the finals near.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 22 - Port Adelaide v GWS Giants Ep130
programme.desc: 4th v 8th in a game that may shape the finals. The Giants sit in 8th with 11 wins after the Swans ended GWS' 7 game win streak. Port Adelaide have lost 4 in a row to fall from 2nd to 4th as the Power fight for to host finals.

programme.title: Back Roads - Cunnamulla, QLD Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Back Roads visits Cunnamulla in south-west Queensland with guest presenter, 24-year-old Yorta Yorta man and TikTok star Tom Forrest aka 'Outback Tom'. He finds a town transforming itself from a dark past to a brighter future.

programme.title: Our Law Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The cadets are deployed to their regional posting to experience the realities of frontline policing.

programme.title: The Family Court Murders - Born In Hope Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The series begins at the NSW Supreme Court where we hear if Leonard Warwick - a man accused of four murders and five bombings that hit at the very heart of Australia's legal system - will walk free, or face justice.

programme.title: The China Century - Cold War Two Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The world's greatest rivalry began with hope and idealism. What went wrong?

programme.title: Compass - Lottery of Life Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - The decision to donate organs from a loved one presents families with one of life's most difficult moments. Compass meets the recipients, donor families, nurses and doctors as they confront these complex questions.

programme.title: Art Works - Across the Regions: Hobart to Karratha Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - We see Women of Troy at Hobart's Ten Days on the Island festival visit Burrup Peninsula's ancient petroglyphs with Perun Bonser meet Sammy Hawker on the South Coast and head to Hanging Rock with Nick Cave and Warren Ellis.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Walter Mikac Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Anh paints anti-violence advocate Walter Mikac. He shares memories of his wife and two children before their lives were devastatingly cut short at Port Arthur and his aim to keep fighting to make the world a safer place.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep65
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Landline Ep27
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep65
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Insiders Ep27
programme.desc: As Australians wrestle with important issues around the cost of living, housing, climate change, the Indigenous Voice, and many others, David Speers and the panel examine how the policies and politics impact people's lives.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep31
programme.desc: The Matildas are into the Final 8 and a World Cup Quarter Final after beating Denmark 2-0. Sam Kerr returns from injury. The Diamonds win the Netball World Cup. Plus the AFL, NRL and NRLW action heats up as the finals near.

programme.title: Australian Story - Fight For Freedom - Kathleen Folbigg Ep16
programme.desc: Australian Story's coverage of Kathleen Folbigg's case helped kickstart the scientific research that ultimately freed her. Watch the updated story of her fight for freedom over the last twenty years.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep28
programme.desc: With a slowing economy, high inflation, a cost-of-living crisis, interest rate rises and global economic headwinds, it's never been more important to keep an eye on your finances. The week in business with Rachel Pupazzoni.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep30
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents a weekly roundup of stories filed by the ABC's international correspondents posted across the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India, Indonesia and more.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep28
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Landline Ep27
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Early Ep161
programme.desc: Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews plus Tony Armstrong with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep161
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Karina Carvalho in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep161
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Australians - Parrot Paradise Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Parrots are by far some of the world's most intelligent birds. Aaron Pedersen explores why these intelligent birds thrive in Australia, and what kind of impact their exceptional intellect has on our environment.

programme.title: Paramedics Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Nat and Leonard get a surprise while treating a suspected drug overdose. A heartbreaking fall for a 98-year-old woman requires a delicate rescue mission. And vicious abuse from a member of the public shocks Amanda and Taz.

programme.title: Wide Open Spaces - Narriearra Station Ep2
programme.desc: Hard people for a hard land. Narriearra Station sprawls across 150,000 hectares in a remote New South Wales. After more than a century its becoming a national park rich in flora and fauna and Indigenous and pastoral history.

programme.title: Landline Ep27
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Path - Prof Greg Jordan Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - We meet a scientist who shares his love of the fascinating Fagus tree, which turns the Tasmanian high country into a riot of autumn colour each year.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep141
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep161
programme.desc: Gemma Veness brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events with the latest breaking news, the best coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to get you up to speed on what you need to know.

programme.title: The Drum Ep146
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep161
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep125
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep161
programme.desc: More news, more often: the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep113
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep161
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Bollywood: The Politics Behind The Scenes Ep15
programme.desc: In India the Modi Government is being accused of waging a war on Bollywood, the county's most powerful cultural force. Film makers who criticise the government or resist pressure to produce pro-Hindu content face a backlash.

programme.title: The World Ep161
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The Floating World
programme.desc: Prof. Frederik Cryns, a historian specializing in the interaction between the West and Japan, timeslips to 19th century Tokyo and discovers the resilience of the local people in the face of disasters.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Tsubo-niwa, life enhanced by quintessential spaces. Dive deep into the beauty of the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions (28 Min.)
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: mosquito coils & screw removal tools.

programme.title: Bosai: Tsunami Observation
programme.desc: Earthquakes often put Japan at the risk of a tsunami, yet underestimating tsunami height can have dire consequences. What makes the difference between life and death in the event of a major tsunami?

programme.title: Pythagoraswitch Mini
programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking, we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "See the Wiggle Men!"...

programme.desc: Fuzjko Hemming, now in her 90s, is celebrated globally as a pianist of the soul. We follow her on her journey to Mallorca, where she delves into the world of Chopin, her artist hero.

programme.desc: Prof. Frederik Cryns, a historian specializing in the interaction between the West and Japan, timeslips to 19th century Tokyo and discovers the resilience of the local people in the face of disasters.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Tsubo-niwa, life enhanced by quintessential spaces. Dive deep into the beauty of the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Isamu Noguchi'S A-Bomb Cenotaph
programme.desc: Sculptor Isamu Noguchi's Hiroshima cenotaph was never built. The program depicts the life and thoughts of an artist who struggled to bridge the gap between his two homelands, Japan and America.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: After nearly 40 years, a key participant in a historic festival must step down due to ill health. Will his successor be able to tackle his heavy responsibility and fulfill his important role?

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #13 I want to see the snow. / To say what you want to do, replace the "masu" ending of a verb with "tai desu." For example, "mimasu" (to see) becomes "mitai desu" (to want to see).

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Kyo-kanoko Shibori, untying the beauty bound within. Dive deep into the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: The Shisorapuchi River is very popular among canoeists. A married couple goes down the river in a canoe flush with mountain snowmelt. They skillfully negotiate thrilling river rapids of Hokkaido.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Rising
programme.desc: Discover how surplus rice is being transformed into bioplastic. The project takes advantage of unused farmland in Fukushima, contributing to the recovery of an area devastated by the 2011 disaster.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-19.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at watches and clocks: clever and innovative timepieces.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: On a hot summer's day, a kitty leads us to traditional food near a local shrine. Get cool in a maiko's home with another kitty before enjoying sparklers at night.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Darwin'S Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Scuba divers descend into the nighttime morass of a hundred thousand small slimy creatures extending in all directions. It's a squid run, a rarely seen soiree now at great risk due to climate change.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: Mt. Fuji, the tallest mountain in Japan, has many faces. See the beauty of these different Fujis through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Listen To The Earth
programme.desc: Leading experts teach us by means of demonstrations and quizzes how to listen to the Earth and prepare for earthquakes, typhoons, volcanoes and other life-threatening natural disasters.

programme.title: Story Land
programme.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries. Watch out, too, for the delightful illustrations!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Belgium's third-largest city, Ghent is located at the confluence of the Lys and Scheldt rivers. It's a town built by merchants who prospered due to river trade. Ghent is known as the "City of Art."

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: NHK Documentary
programme.desc: Three "lost" decades since the end of Japan's bubble era have damaged the country's global image and spawned the term "Cheap Japan." We explore what it might take to revive Japan's economy once again.

programme.title: 2023 Gran Premio MotoGP™ Guru by Gryfyn de España Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The Spanish Grand Prix at the Circuito de Jerez is a colourful event which draws massive crowds from all over to watch the worlds best riders do battle in the sunshine of Andalusia. The Jerez circuit in southern Spain was built in 1986, hosted its first Grand Prix a year later and has remained on the MotoGP calendar ever since. As a nation, Spain has produced some great riders over the years such as Angel Nieto, Ricardo Tormo, Sito Pons, Alex Criville and Jorge Martinez Aspar. The likes of Jorge Lorenzo, Marc Marquez, Dani Pedrosa and Maverick Viales now continue the Spanish success story in the premier class

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2322
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs Font
programme.desc: Prelims - A bantamweight bout between former interim UFC Bantamweight Championship challenger Cory Sandhagen and Umar Nurmagomedov was expected to headline the event. However, Nurmagomedov withdrew from the event in mid-July due to a shoulder injury. He was replaced by Rob Font in a catchweight bout of 140 pounds. The Ultimate Fighter: Team Joanna vs. Team Cludia women's strawweight winner Tatiana Suarez and Virna Jandiroba were scheduled to meet in a women's strawweight bout. However on June 20, it was announced that Jandiroba pulled out due to a knee injury and was replaced by former UFC Women's Strawweight Champion Jssica Andrade.
